name: Soul Bounce
description:
Soul Bounce is a mini project made for the out of time jam in all the about 24hrs of free time I had. Its unfinished and has no ending yet but I hope you enjoy the few levels it has to offer. 

Leave  a rating and your feedback is very much appreciated.

-CONTROLS- 

Mouse for direction . LMB to dash upward.

-Use of The Theme-

For the application of the theme I decided to implement a Death Laser that spawns after 10 seconds , discouraging the player from staying in the level too long.
